sentences.en: &B{in the cold light of day} it all seemed so ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 在现实生活中，这一切显得如此荒谬可笑。

sentences.en: "That is correct, Meg," he answered in his cold, dead voice.
sentences.cn: “没错，梅格。”他用冰冷、阴沉的声音答道。

sentences.en: a blast of cold air
sentences.cn: 一股冷空气

sentences.en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentences.en: A feverish child refuses to eat and asks only for cold drinks.
sentences.cn: 发烧的孩子不愿吃东西，只会要冷饮。

sentences.en: another drop in the inflation rate was cold comfort for the 2.74 million jobless.
sentences.cn: 对于274万失业者来说，通货膨胀率的又一次下跌只是无用的安慰罢了。

sentences.en: Basal metabolism is much lower for creatures in cold water.
sentences.cn: 冷水中生物的基础代谢速度要低很多。

sentences.en: Don’t go out in the cold without your coat!
sentences.cn: 外面很冷，穿上外套再出去！

sentences.en: He must have come inside to get out of the cold.
sentences.cn: 他肯定是进来避寒的。

sentences.en: Her nostrils were pinkish, as though she had a cold.
sentences.cn: 她的鼻孔略带粉红，好像患了感冒似的。

sentences.en: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly.
sentences.cn: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

sentences.en: I began to &B{get cold feet}, but the other two guys were totally positive .
sentences.cn: 我开始动摇，可其他两个人却深信不疑。

sentences.en: I found her a rather austere, distant, somewhat cold person.
sentences.cn: 我发现她相当严厉，拒人于千里之外，近乎冷漠。

sentences.en: I stepped outside and pulled up my collar against the cold mist.
sentences.cn: 我走出门，竖起衣领抵御冷雾。

sentences.en: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.cn: 我冷得发抖。

sentences.en: I’ve got a bad cold.
sentences.cn: 我得了重感冒。

sentences.en: Keep your feet dry so you don’t catch a cold.
sentences.cn: 双脚保持干燥，这样就不会得感冒。

sentences.en: Let's dry our hair so we don't catch cold.
sentences.cn: 我们把头发吹干，这样就不会感冒。

sentences.en: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.cn: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.en: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.cn: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: the government forces killed them in cold blood.
sentences.cn: 政府军残忍地杀死了他们。

sentences.en: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.cn: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The media, meanwhile, has blown hot and cold on the affair.
sentences.cn: 同时，媒体对这件事的态度表现得忽冷忽热。

sentences.en: the new England manager gave him the cold shoulder .
sentences.cn: 新来的英格兰队经理冷待了他。

sentences.en: The rage in his eyes made her blood run cold.
sentences.cn: 他眼中的怒火吓得她汗毛倒竖。

sentences.en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentences.en: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.cn: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.en: Whenever I have a cold I get a nosebleed.
sentences.cn: 每次我感冒都会流鼻血。

phrases.phrase: as cold as ice (或 stone, the grave 等.)

phrases.tran_cn: 无用的安慰，不起作用的安慰
拒绝某人；冷落某人；冷待某人
被忽视，被冷落， 孤零零地未介入
冷落的：没有好处以给别人的；被忽视的
对…持批评（或不支持）态度；对…泼冷水

trans.tran_cn: （寒）冷的，冷酷的，冷色调的，真实的
